```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

odCT<- read_csv("~/opioid-reboot/odCT.csv")

HeroinCount <- odCT %>%
   count(Heroin == "Y")

FentCount <- odCT %>%
   count(Fentanyl == "Y")

OxyCount <- odCT %>%
  count(Oxycodone == "Y")
  
MethadCount <- odCT %>%
   count(Methadone == "Y")

MorphineCount <- odCT %>%
   count(`Morphine (not heroin)` == "Y")
```
